text: In taxonomy, Stappia is a genus of the Rhodobacteraceae.See the NCBI webpage on Stappia. Data extracted from the Some members of the genus (now transferred to Labrenzia) oxidize carbon monoxide (CO) aerobically. ==References== ==Further reading== ===Scientific journals=== * * ===Scientific books=== * ===Scientific databases=== ==External links== Category:Bacteria genera Category:Rhodobacteraceae
title: Stappia
